CODE             	LONG DESCRIPTION            	SHORT DESCRIPTION    
DRY          	DRY                              	DRY                        
ICE          	ICE                              	ICE                        
ICP          	ICE PATCH                        	ICP                       
SNP          	SNOW-PLOWED                      	SNP                        
SNU          	SNOW - UNPLOWED                  	SNU                        
WET          	WET                              	WET                        
WTR          	STANDING WATER                   	WTR                        
 99999        	RUNWAY COND INVALID              	ERROR MESSAGE
